# Get Input
n = int(input())

# Find Smallest Harshad Number
while True:
    # Get Digits
    digits = list(str(n))
    # Get Sum of Digits
    sumOfDigits = 0
    for digit in digits:
        sumOfDigits += int(digit)
    # Check if Harshad Number
    if n % sumOfDigits == 0:
        print(n)
        break
    # Increase n by 1
    n += 1
